intro: Zeuktophyllum, commonly known as the false hellebore, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Araceae. It is native to various parts of Asia, including China, Japan, and the Indian subcontinent. The plant typically features heart-shaped leaves and produces clusters of small, white or greenish flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream banks. Due to its toxic properties, it should be handled with care.
